title: ‘Super Teams’ vs. the Clock: Why the Tour de France Needs a TTT Showdown Now
content:
Tour de Hoody: The 'Big 4' have never faced off in a TTT in the 'super team' era at the Tour de France, who doesn't want to see that?

Read the full article at ‘Super Teams’ vs. the Clock: Why the Tour de France Needs a TTT Showdown Now on Velo.
author: ahood
